## Digit Preferences Module

- [{gsm.digitpref}](https://openrbqm.github.io/gsm.digitpref/) has 2 functions!
    - [`splitByPlace()`](https://openrbqm.github.io/gsm.digitpref/reference/splitByPlace.html): Split a vector into a table of place values
    - [`stackedDigitChart()`](https://openrbqm.github.io/gsm.digitpref/reference/stackedDigitChart.html): Plot digit distribution by group
    - Next: The bridge between those two.
